Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Targeting pod stabilization failure. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 16/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
